channel.title: [PI] Superheat Item [PI]
channel.description: Need help with making the magic spell, superheat item, work. Is there any tuts out there, i've searched but couldn't find one.

item.title: [PI] Superheat Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“TyPrizza, post:4, topic:546412”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=665311.msg4447720#msg4447720 date=1409698147]
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/393397-pi-superheat-class.html
Only thing I could find. And it’s not a tutorial, it’s a class. You have to implement it yourself.
[/quote]

I have already implement this class, but i keep getting and error.

c.isSmelting error.

It will rely on the Spell on Item packet(237 in 317 revision) - Should be ItemOnMagic.

You could make it a kind of side step for smelting. Basically instead of being near a furnace, you have the “make 1” option activated by using the spell on the ore (ring of forging effect for iron)

Ive tried adding something into MagicOnItem.java but it still doesnt work.[/quote]
If you keep getting an error, then fix it.
Hint: declare the missing variable…

Read full topic

Only thing I could find. And it’s not a tutorial, it’s a class. You have to implement it yourself.[/quote]

I have already implement this class, but i keep getting and error.

c.isSmelting error.

[quote=“matzie, post:3, topic:546412”]It will rely on the Spell on Item packet(237 in 317 revision) - Should be ItemOnMagic.

You could make it a kind of side step for smelting. Basically instead of being near a furnace, you have the “make 1” option activated by using the spell on the ore (ring of forging effect for iron)[/quote]

Ive tried adding something into MagicOnItem.java but it still doesnt work.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Superheat Item [PI]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

It will rely on the Spell on Item packet(237 in 317 revision) - Should be ItemOnMagic.

You could make it a kind of side step for smelting. Basically instead of being near a furnace, you have the “make 1” option activated by using the spell on the ore (ring of forging effect for iron)

Read full topic
